events.name: Decarbonisation of energy and transport for net zero ambitions
events.wd_label: Decarbonisation of energy and transport for net zero ambitions
events.wd_description: Decarbonisation of energy and transport will require increased demand for graphite, one of the major battery raw materials.

events.name: Graphite supply chains in Africa
events.wd_description: Many African countries have significant graphite resources and some operating graphite mines.

events.name: Adding value to graphite products in Africa
events.wd_label: Adding value to graphite products in Africa
events.wd_description: Currently, Africa has no capacity for the production of specialist products such as spherical graphite or manufacture of battery components.
